column5: Controls parameters via external expression pedal
Controls the overall output volume
Selects the modulation effect type
Selects the filter type
Selects the modulation LFO shape
Selects the tremolo LFO shape
Selects the pan LFO shape
Selects the filter LFO shape
Enables modulation right channel inversion
Disables modulation right channel inversion
Enables filter right channel inversion
Disables filter right channel inversion
Sets the rhythmic division for modulation
Sets the rhythmic division for tremolo
Sets the rhythmic division for panning
Sets the rhythmic division for filter
Controls the feedback amount for modulation
Controls the resonance amount for filter
Controls the depth of the tremolo effect
Controls the depth of the modulation effect
Controls the depth of the panning effect
Controls the depth of the filter effect
